showScoreExcerpt: "This show, despite a major cast change, is a 10 out of 10. It's crisp, loud, and strong. I saw the swing cast - and even with these 3rd stringers - the show was magnificent and I cannot imagine it being better...To be fair - it's dense - very dense...I think the ensemble may just be the hardest working ensemble on Broadway today...It's a bona-fide hit and I am incredibly thankful for the ticket and will treasure my experience even more because of it."

keyPhrases.quote: This show, despite a major cast change, is a 10 out of 10
the show was magnificent and I cannot imagine it being better
It's a bona-fide hit and I am incredibly thankful for the ticket and will treasure my experience

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Explicit 10/10 rating with superlatives like 'magnificent' and strong personal endorsement despite seeing understudies indicates unqualified enthusiasm. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and strong recommendation, highlighting the show's excellence even with a cast change.
